ingredients.content: 14 oz butternut squash, peeled and cubed (1 in.)
3 oz red bell pepper, cubed (1 in.)

preparations.content: Place onion, garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add curry paste, cardamom and mustard seeds and sauté <b>3 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add lemongrass, vegetable stock, water, coconut milk, squash and salt and cook <b>10 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.
Add zucchini, cauliflower, red pepper and beans and cook <b>5 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.
Remove and discard lemongrass pieces. Garnish with mint, squeeze of lime and serve immediately.
